connection.header: Enter your iZettle credentials and follow the next steps to setup product sync.
connection.subtitle: Any changes you make to your Shopware products will now automatically be updated in your connected iZettle account.

sales-channel.label: Sales Channel
sales-channel.header: Pick a Storefront Sales Channel as base
sales-channel.subtitle: The chosen Storefront Sales Channel will provide the selection of products to sync. You may reduce the selection in a later step.

locale.header: Choose localization settings for the sync
locale.subtitle: The chosen domain will set the language of product names and descriptions. You will need to choose a currency even if you don't want to sync prices.

product-stream.label: Dynamic Product Group
product-stream.subtitle:
You can select a Dynamic Product Group to reduce the number of synchronized products of the selected Storefront Sales Channel.
If you have not yet created a Dynamic Product Group or do not wish to reduce the number of synchronized products, you can skip this step now or select a product stream later.

sync.syncPricesSubtitle:
If checked, prices will be exported with VAT.
Otherwise product prices will be set to 0 and can be changed in your iZettle product library.
sync.replaceSubtitle: If checked, the existing products in your iZettle product library will be removed.

finish.firstParagraph:
Your iZettle account is now linked to your Sales Channel and syncs products to iZettle.
In the future, when you make a sale, we will update your stock in iZettle and Shopware.
finish.secondParagraph: If you need to update your products, we recommend you do this in Shopware and they'll sync to your iZettle app automatically.

test.messageTestError: The credentials could not be validated.
